evidence.claim: The company mentions compliance with HIPAA regulations for handling patient information, indicating they have health data handling in place.
The careers page notes a focus on technology and security in managing care services, hinting at an infrastructure that aligns with health tech standards.
The company's services include coordination with healthcare providers, necessitating an understanding of health data integration.
The website content outlines the importance of safe data handling practices, reflecting compliance with industry standards like HIPAA.

icp.icp_reason: Lacks evidence of dealing with X12 transactions or API automation.
